title: How Did Taliyah Find Her Freljord Calf?
body:
Taliyah’s Freljord skin has a calf that Taliyah cradles.  The skin refers to her journey through the Freljord.  I have questions:

-How did she find it?
-How does she take care of it?
-Where is its mother?
-What species is it?
-How long will she keep it?

replies.body: I dont think that the skin is canon, even if she went to Freljord... because she cant use ice powers and she doesnt have white hair.

All skins are either a "what if" or "in the past", its just like noxus poppy, it never ties in with real lore.

one example of in 'in the past' is legionaire lux, (atleast to my knowledge)
Taliyah, however, does travel through the Freljord during her lore.

> [{quoted}](name=Ifneth,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=QU66aQ6G,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-07-01T21:09:14.027+0000)
>
> Taliyah, however, does travel through the Freljord during her lore.

I believe this falls under my second catagory "in the past" as the story goes on, she is no longer in freljord.

but the calf question is still up for debate.

The calf isn't the focus of the skin not at all important to her lore however. If a Rioter thought anything about the calf it was just headcannon and goes along the lines of Taliyah saving a lost or orphaned deer creature.
Her lore merely mentions that she travels through it.  We donâ€™t know what happens.  I wish Riot would flesh it out.
can we just get another none esports taliyah skin already
